AutoFinishNode.description: 节点超时是否自动完成

GmtExpired.description: 流程节点超时时间（Unix时间戳）

OperatorRole.description:
流程节点操作人角色，取值：
- System：系统
- Custom：客户
- Provider：服务提供商

GmtStart.description: 流程节点开始时间（Unix时间戳）

NodeStatus.description:
节点执行状态，取值：
- NotStart：未开始
- Starting：进行中
- Cancel：已取消
- Finish：已完成

GmtFinished.description: 流程节点完成时间（Unix时间戳）

AllowRollbackNode.description: 是否允许执行回滚到上一个流程节点

TemplateForm.description:
流程节点表单内容，内容为JSON。

示例代码如下：

```
[
    {
        "fieldKey": "TFD0", //表单key
        "isRequired": true, //是否必填项
        "maxLength": 50, //最大值长度
        "placeHolder": "姓名", //表单值简介
        "stepNum": 0, //排序值（升序）
        "title": "收货人姓名", //表单标题
        "type": "text" //表单类型
    },
    {
        "fieldKey": "TFD1",
        "isRequired": true,
        "maxLength": 50,
        "placeHolder": "手机号码",
        "stepNum": 1,
        "title": "收货人电话",
        "type": "text"
    },
    {
        "fieldKey": "TFD2",
        "isRequired": true,
        "maxLength": 50,
        "placeHolder": "省市区街道门牌号码",
        "stepNum": 2,
        "title": "详细收货地址",
        "type": "textarea"
    }
]

```
TemplateForm.example: [ {"fieldKey": "TFD0","isRequired": true,"maxLength": 50, "placeHolder": "姓名","stepNum": 0,"title": "收货人姓名","type": "text" },{ "fieldKey": "TFD1","isRequired": true,"maxLength": 50,"placeHolder": "手机号码","stepNum": 1,"title": "收货人电话","type": "text"},{"fieldKey": "TFD2","isRequired": true,"maxLength": 50,"placeHolder": "省市区街道门牌号码","stepNum": 2,"title": "详细收货地址","type": "textarea"}]

NeedAttachment.description: 是否强制要求上传附件

500.errorMessage: The request processing has failed due to some unknown error.

title: 获取项目流程节点列表
summary: 调用DescribeProjectNodes获取项目流程节点列表。
